mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO home_user ( username, password, name, use_facebook, access_facebook, refresh_facebook, use_instagram, access_instagram, use_naver, access_naver, refresh_naver, updated_at, created_at
) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{use_facebook}, #{access_facebook}, #{refresh_facebook}, #{use_instagram}, #{access_instagram}, #{use_naver}, #{access_naver}, #{refresh_naver}, #{updated_at}, #{created_at} )
